body: Salutations fellow players! I am Davish of Minebattle. I just recently discovered this server on the Overcast Network forums in the shutdown announcement thread. I've decided to come see this server. I started playing minecraft because of one gamemode however, Destroy the Core. I saw a YouTuber making videos playing it on Minebattle.com and checked it out, though sadly that server shut down last year. I hope to meet new comrades on this server, and if you'd like to know a bit more about me, please feel welcome to ask.
body_tagged: Salutations fellow players! I am Davish of Minebattle. I just recently discovered this server on the Overcast Network forums in the shutdown announcement thread. title: Greetings Avicus Network!

replies.body:
Welcome, how are you man?

What do you think about the server so far anyhow?
replies.body_tagged:
Welcome, how are you man?

What do you think about the server so far anyhow?

replies.body: It's alot like OCN actually. I'm playing on Throwback right now and I'm getting back to sniping like I used to in the glory days. It's not like DTC with TNT cannons and everything but it's like OCN's Destroy the Monument, so far it's a thumbs up.

A new update is coming very soon, bringing CTF, KoTH and more!

replies.body: Aloha! Welcome, if you need any help or have any questions. Feel free to contact me!
replies.body_tagged: Aloha! Welcome, if you need any help or have any questions. Feel free to contact me!

replies.body: Hi Davish. I think I've seen you around on ocn before. Welcome to avicus
replies.body_tagged: Hi Davish. I think I've seen you around on ocn before. Welcome to avicus

replies.body:
Heyyy! It's always nice to see new faces around here, if you have any questions/comments/concerns make sure to ask a staff member, and they will be glad to help.

Also if you want to interact with the community even more you should join the Community Slack. Hope you have a great time here on Avi!

replies.body: Thanks m8. Pardon me but I recognize that skin of yours, one of Minebattle's Co-owners had it, he always said he was the only one with it, everytime I told him I saw people with it on other servers he'd just deny it like the complete boss he was. Cheers man, thought you might have a good laugh about it xD
